dialogue:

[opacity value:semi]Elder:
[opacity value:regular] 
Today is the fateful day! 
You remember what you are supposed to do right?
[endl value:2]
Bring back a [color value:red]Fruit of Vanth
[color value:regular] from the depths of the 
world, so we may prosper once more.
name: Welcomer
